plugin.name: Binary Ninja Dynamic Analysis Tools
plugin.description: Adds a live debugger and other dynamic tools to Binary Ninja
plugin.longdescription: Uses Binjatron to add a live debugger, memory viewer, register viewer, and traceback viewer to Binary Ninja, complete with highlighting that should make it easier for beginners to identify what happens when a binary executes.

license.name: IDK, MIT Probably?
license.text: NCC's legal team can figure this out.

plugin.author: Eric Hennenfent
